amendment.description: Amendment instructed the EPA to conduct a study to determine the impact of climate change on pollution of coastal recreation waters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to conduct a study by the EPA to determine the impact of climate change on pollution of coastal recreation waters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
